summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Grand Way, from Thirty-eighth Avenue to Grand Avenue; East Union Street from Thirty-seventh Avenue to Thirty-eighth Avenue; East Pike Street from Thirty-seventh Avenue to Thirty-eighth Avenue; Thirty-eighth Avenue from East Pike Street to One hundred fifty-five (155) feet south of East Union Street; Grand Avenue from Grand Way to Newport Avenue; Newport Avenue from Grand Avenue to Hugo Place; Hugo Place from Newport Avenue to Lakeside Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks, with all necessary crosswalks, catch basins and inlets for surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 598 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
